rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean aesthetics, incorporating warm earth tones and natural stone finishes. The design follows Vastu principles by aligning the seating area towards the eastern side to invite positivity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining area adjoining the living room with floor-to-ceiling windows to bring natural light. Vastu alignment is maintained with a north-east seating arrangement for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern Mediterranean kitchen designed with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side to enhance ventilation and natural light. Vastu guidelines suggest keeping the main door in the south-east direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony. The room is oriented towards the east to welcome early sunlight, as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A master bedroom with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and a spacious balcony overlooking the garden. Vastu principles suggest placing this room in the south-west direction for comfort and balance.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is positioned in the north-west direction to ensure positive energy flow according to Vastu. The design features Mediterranean styled arches and durable wood finishes.

openings.name: Balcony Doors
openings.description: Each bedroom includes a sliding door leading to its private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for unobstructed views.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows are strategically placed to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy and energy efficiency. They comply with local building norms.

private_gym.description: A dedicated private gym integrated within the ground floor, designed with a Mediterranean theme and natural ventilation. It includes state-of-the-art equipment while adhering to safety standards.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable additional bedroom designed with Mediterranean elements and floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu guidelines suggest an eastern orientation for vitality.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another bedroom with similar Mediterranean aesthetics and a private balcony. Positioned towards the north for clarity and energy flow.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A smaller bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony that opens to a serene garden view. Vastu principles recommend this room in the west for introspection.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom featuring Mediterranean tiles and fixtures. Vastu suggests placing the toilet in the south-east corner.

openings.name: Balcony Doors
openings.description: Sliding doors in each bedroom to access their private balconies with expansive views.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into the design for ample natural light and airflow.
